EmailTemplate.name: 02-15-23 DBNK Accelerate Promotion Email.DBNK Accelerate Promotion Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Fresh perspectives on digital transformation, data modernization and more
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi, Are you constantly thinking about your data modernization challenges, digital transformation and financial wellness efforts? You’re not alone. Check out the latest issue of Accelerate <[[https://online.fliphtml5.com/kyvvb/emsz/#p=1]]> digital magazine. It’s loaded with inspiring stories on how NCR customers are successfully tackling these challenges. It also includes expert insights into 2023 digital banking trends. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
